  • Home

  • How We Do It
  • Reviews
  • Contact Us
Get In Touch
Lauth Investigations International

Your Partner in Corporate Executive Enterprise Investigation Services

We provide corporate investigation services to protect businesses from internal and external threats. Our team, with backgrounds in law enforcement, military intelligence, and corporate security, delivers precise, actionable results across a wide array of services. Each service is customized to meet your organization’s specific needs, focusing on mitigating risks and ensuring business integrity.

Get In Touch
  • Professional Team
  • Proven Results
  • 24/7 Support

Why Choose LAUTH Investigations Team

Lauth’s comprehensive approach is built on a foundation of experience and success. Our team has a proven track record in managing complex cases with the latest tools and technology, ensuring accurate, timely, and actionable information, thus enabling businesses to proactively address issues and protect their bottom line before problems escalate.

Human Resources Investigations

Effective human resources (HR) investigations are essential for maintaining legal compliance and workforce efficiency. Lauth Investigations team specializes in investigating harassment, discrimination, employee misconduct, theft, non-compete violations, and workers’ compensation fraud, ensuring that companies can confidently address and resolve such issues.

Read More

Corporate Culture Audits

Corporate culture has a significant impact on a company’s success. Lauth Investigations International conducts detailed audits that assess internal operations, employee relations, and policy enforcement. Our findings provide companies with actionable recommendations to enhance culture, improve productivity, and boost employee retention.
Read More

Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO)

Compliance with EEO laws is both a legal and moral imperative. Lauth offers thorough investigations into harassment, discrimination, and workplace misconduct to help companies uphold these standards. Our investigations provide the documentation necessary to implement corrective measures and ensure ongoing compliance.
Read More

Whistleblower Line

Whistleblowers play a vital role in maintaining organizational integrity. To support this, Lauth Investigations offers a secure, anonymous whistleblower line, thus encouraging employees to report unethical or illegal behavior without fear of retaliation. Our investigations protect whistleblowers while uncovering wrongdoings.
Read More

Corporate Theft Investigations

Corporate theft, whether of physical assets, intellectual property, or financial resources, can significantly affect a company’s bottom line. Lauth Investigations excels in detecting and preventing theft through surveillance, digital forensics, and internal audits, working closely with law enforcement to ensure perpetrators face legal consequences.
Read More

Fraud & Forgery Investigations

Fraud and forgery can seriously damage a company’s financial health and reputation. Lauth’s experts in forensic accounting, document analysis, and undercover operations are well-equipped to investigate and gather the necessary evidence to hold offenders accountable.
Read More

Threat Assessment

Companies face various challenges, from physical security risks to cyber threats. Lauth’s threat assessment services encompass physical security evaluations, cybersecurity analysis, and ongoing monitoring to safeguard companies from evolving dangers.

Read More

White Collar Crime Investigations

White-collar crimes, including embezzlement, insider trading, and money laundering, can incapacitate a business. Lauth uses advanced techniques like financial transaction monitoring and document collection to expose these crimes and works alongside regulatory bodies to pursue justice.
Read More

Undercover Workplace Investigations

Specializing in undercover workplace investigations, Lauth helps businesses uncover hidden misconduct to protect the work environment. With experienced investigators embedded discreetly within organizations, Lauth gathers crucial insights into issues like employee theft, workplace harassment, policy violations, or fraud. Each investigation is tailored to meet client’s needs, ensuring confidentiality and minimal disruption to overall operations. By identifying the root of workplace problems, Lauth empowers organizations to take informed action and restore a safe, productive atmosphere

Read More
Get In Touch

How We Do It!

Unrelenting Due-Diligence

At Lauth, we practice due diligence by leaving no stone unturned. We utilize verified databases and advanced surveillance technology to construct thorough background profiles. This meticulous approach ensures that we have a comprehensive understanding of the subjects involved in the investigation.

Strong Foundations

We begin each investigation by having a comprehensive discussion with our clients. This involves gathering detailed information about the case, including the main individuals involved, the documented facts, and all potential risk factors. This initial step allows us to lay a strong foundation for the investigation process.

Qualified Professionals

Our private investigation firm proudly holds an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau – a badge of honor that reflects our continued commitment to excellence. Beyond this, we consistently receive outstanding reviews from satisfied clients on Google, expressing their appreciation for our private investigation and intelligence services.

Results You Can Trust

After concluding each investigation, we furnish our clients with a meticulous report, coupled with expert recommendations. Our success is synonymous with our clients’ success, as they leverage the provided information to make intricate decisions in both their personal and professional lives.

Get In Touch

Commitment to Technology and Innovation

Lauth Investigations stays at the cutting edge of corporate investigations by utilizing advanced tools such as digital forensics, Open Source Intelligence (OSINT), and data analytics. This commitment to technology allows us to handle even the most complex cases efficiently while maintaining confidentiality and precision.

Get In Touch

Hire a Corporate Investigator Today

Whether your business is facing HR challenges, security threats, or financial crimes, Lauth Investigations International can help. Our expertise allows you to focus on growing your business while they protect your interests. Contact them today for a free consultation and develop a customized plan to address your specific corporate needs.

Schedule a consultation with Lauth Investigations International today to ensure your business stays secure and compliant. Our expert team is ready to provide the comprehensive investigative services your organization requires to thrive.

Get In Touch

Please Read Our CCA Brochure

Reviews

What Our Clients Say About Us

Working with Lauth Investigation is both efficient and rewarding. They have been able to obtain crucial information that has impacted the overall effectiveness of my team. This has put my company growth in the forefront of everyone’s mind. The results of their in house consultations were immeasurable.
B
Bradley L
The results of Lauth Investigations has been rapid, clear, and understandable. My company needed this refreshing crisis management consultation process. I am happy to have such an incredible team to lean on when we need them.
J
Jennifer B
The information Lauth Investigations was able to obtain in regards to the unethical activities occurring at one of our warehouses was exactly what our HR Director needed to begin termination procedures on not just one individual but an entire department. I would definitely recommend them!
B
Benjamin A
Get In Touch

Get In Touch

Feel free to contact us with your any questions, contact our team and let’s schedule a call

Call Us

317-951-1100

Email Us

hirelauth@lauthinvestigations.com

Our Location

201 North Illinois Street, 16th Floor South Tower Indianapolis, IN 46204

Contact Form

Facebook-f X-twitter Youtube Instagram
